text: Terbium(III) fluoride is an inorganic compound with chemical formula TbF3. It is hard to dissolve in water.氟化铽. Chemical Book. [2018-12-10] It can be produced by reacting terbium(III) carbonate and 40% hydrofluoric acid at 40°C.王亚军, 樊宏伟. 氟化铽的沉淀方法及组成研究[J]. 化学世界, 1999(11):575-578. ==Uses== Terbium(III) fluoride is used for producing metallic terbium.Schmidt, F. A., Peterson, D. T., & Wheelock, J. T. (1986). U.S. Patent No. 4,612,047. Washington, DC: U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. :2 TbF3 \+ 3 Ca → 3 CaF2 \+ 2 Tb ==References== Category:Terbium compounds Category:Fluorides
title: Terbium(III) fluoride
